alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 8:52AM CDT until May 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. .Rainfall this weekend will cause additional rises. The current forecast only takes into account precipitation through 7 AM Saturday. Rainfall is anticipated to last through Sunday, so the precipitation from the entire event is not taken into account. Additional rises are possible with additional rainfall on Saturday and Sunday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94). * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding begins on high ground near gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 19.5 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
